title: Is there a cap for armor penetration and magic penetration?
body: The highest magic penetration I have ever got to was 45%. Is there a capped armor/magic penetration?

replies.body: No, there's no coded limit on pen. Whatever you can get from items, runes etc will stack.
There is no brakes on the penetration station {{champion:44}}

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Aa7RFsca,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-26T20:25:08.803+0000)
>
> No, there's no coded limit on pen. Whatever you can get from items, runes etc will stack.

Meddler !
Only as much as you can buy or use runes/masteries/abilities for.

{{champion:122}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3071}} 
So...
70% Armor pen, and black cleaver...
heh
hehe
MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA
Lethality is just flat armour pen.
Technically, it's 40% Lethality that's converted to Flat Armor Pen, and the other 60% scales off with the enemy target champion's level.
There is no actual cap, but there is a limit to how many items/runes/masteries you can get.
